projects.title: AI-Powered Chat Assistant
projects.description: Built an intelligent chatbot using LangChain and OpenAI GPT-4 with RAG capabilities for context-aware responses. Implemented vector search using FAISS for efficient document retrieval.

projects.title: E-Learning Platform
projects.description: Full-stack MERN application for online course management with user authentication, payment integration using Stripe, and real-time notifications.

projects.title: Task Management API
projects.description: RESTful API with authentication, role-based access control, and real-time updates using WebSockets. Includes comprehensive testing and CI/CD pipeline.

projects.title: Document Q&A System
projects.description: RAG-based system for querying documents using embeddings and vector search. Supports PDF, DOCX, and TXT files with semantic search capabilities.

work.description: Developed REST APIs for user management and integrated third-party payment services. Optimized database queries reducing response time by 40%.
Building AI agents with tool calling and multi-step reasoning. Implemented RAG pipelines and vector search for production applications.
